00097 typedef struct QuicktimeExport {
00098 
00099     FSSpec      theSpec;
00100     short       resRefNum;
00101     Str255      qtfilename;
00102 
00103     Media       theMedia;

00107     GWorldPtr           theGWorld;

00110 
00111     ImBuf       *ibuf;  //imagedata for Quicktime's Gworld
00112     ImBuf       *ibuf2; //copy of renderdata, to be Y-flipped
00113 
00114 } QuicktimeExport;

00116 typedef struct QuicktimeComponentData {
00117 
00118     ComponentInstance   theComponent;
00119     SCTemporalSettings  gTemporalSettings;

00134 static QuicktimeCodecTypeDesc qtVideoCodecList[] = {
00135     {kRawCodecType, 1, "Uncompressed"},
00136     {kJPEGCodecType, 2, "JPEG"},
00137     {kMotionJPEGACodecType, 3, "M-JPEG A"},
00138     {kMotionJPEGBCodecType, 4, "M-JPEG B"},
00139     {kDVCPALCodecType, 5, "DV PAL"},
00140     {kDVCNTSCCodecType, 6, "DV/DVCPRO NTSC"},
00141     {kDVCPROHD720pCodecType, 7, "DVCPRO HD 720p"},
00142     {kDVCPROHD1080i50CodecType, 8, "DVCPRO HD 1080i50"},
00143     {kDVCPROHD1080i60CodecType, 9, "DVCPRO HD 1080i60"},
00144     {kMPEG4VisualCodecType, 10, "MPEG4"},
00145     {kH263CodecType, 11, "H.263"},
00146     {kH264CodecType, 12, "H.264"},
00147     {0,0,NULL}};
00148 
00149 static int qtVideoCodecCount = 12;
00150 
00151 int quicktime_get_num_videocodecs()
00152 {
00153     return qtVideoCodecCount;
00154 }
00155 
00156 QuicktimeCodecTypeDesc* quicktime_get_videocodecType_desc(int indexValue)
00157 {
00158     if ((indexValue>=0) && (indexValue < qtVideoCodecCount))
00159         return &qtVideoCodecList[indexValue];
00160     else
00161         return NULL;
00162 }
00163 
00164 int quicktime_rnatmpvalue_from_videocodectype(int codecType)
00165 {
00166     int i;
00167     for (i=0;i<qtVideoCodecCount;i++) {
00168         if (qtVideoCodecList[i].codecType == codecType)
00169             return qtVideoCodecList[i].rnatmpvalue;
00170     }
00171     
00172     return 0;
00173 }
00174 
00175 int quicktime_videocodecType_from_rnatmpvalue(int rnatmpvalue)
00176 {
00177     int i;
00178     for (i=0;i<qtVideoCodecCount;i++) {
00179         if (qtVideoCodecList[i].rnatmpvalue == rnatmpvalue)
00180             return qtVideoCodecList[i].codecType;
00181     }
00182     
00183     return 0;   
00184 }

00188 static void CheckError(OSErr err, char *msg, ReportList *reports)
00189 {
00190     if (err != noErr) {
00191         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "%s: %d", msg, err);
00192     }
00193 }

00195 
00196 static OSErr QT_SaveCodecSettingsToScene(RenderData *rd, ReportList *reports)
00197 {   
00198     QTAtomContainer     myContainer = NULL;
00199     ComponentResult     myErr = noErr;
00200     Ptr                 myPtr;
00201     long                mySize = 0;
00202 
00203     CodecInfo           ci;
00204 
00205     QuicktimeCodecData *qcd = rd->qtcodecdata;
00206     
00207     // check if current scene already has qtcodec settings, and clear them
00208     if (qcd) {
00209         free_qtcodecdata(qcd);
00210     }
00211     else {
00212         qcd = rd->qtcodecdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeCodecData), "QuicktimeCodecData");
00213     }
00214 
00215     // obtain all current codec settings
00216     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00217     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00218     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00219 
00220     // retreive codecdata from quicktime in a atomcontainer
00221     myErr = SCGetSettingsAsAtomContainer(qtdata->theComponent,  &myContainer);
00222     if (myErr != noErr) {
00223         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Quicktime: SCGetSettingsAsAtomContainer failed\n"); 
00224         goto bail;
00225     }
00226 
00227     // get the size of the atomcontainer
00228     mySize = GetHandleSize((Handle)myContainer);
00229 
00230     // lock and convert the atomcontainer to a *valid* pointer
00231     QTLockContainer(myContainer);
00232     myPtr = *(Handle)myContainer;
00233 
00234     // copy the Quicktime data into the blender qtcodecdata struct
00235     if (myPtr) {
00236         qcd->cdParms = MEM_mallocN(mySize, "qt.cdParms");
00237         memcpy(qcd->cdParms, myPtr, mySize);
00238         qcd->cdSize = mySize;
00239 
00240         GetCodecInfo (&ci, qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType, 0);
00241     }
00242     else {
00243         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Quicktime: QT_SaveCodecSettingsToScene failed\n"); 
00244     }
00245 
00246     QTUnlockContainer(myContainer);
00247 
00248 bail:
00249     if (myContainer != NULL)
00250         QTDisposeAtomContainer(myContainer);
00251         
00252     return((OSErr)myErr);
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 static OSErr QT_GetCodecSettingsFromScene(RenderData *rd, ReportList *reports)
00257 {   
00258     Handle              myHandle = NULL;
00259     ComponentResult     myErr = noErr;
00260 
00261     QuicktimeCodecData *qcd = rd->qtcodecdata;
00262 
00263     // if there is codecdata in the blendfile, convert it to a Quicktime handle 
00264     if (qcd) {
00265         myHandle = NewHandle(qcd->cdSize);
00266         PtrToHand( qcd->cdParms, &myHandle, qcd->cdSize);
00267     }
00268         
00269     // restore codecsettings to the quicktime component
00270     if (qcd->cdParms && qcd->cdSize) {
00271         myErr = SCSetSettingsFromAtomContainer((GraphicsExportComponent)qtdata->theComponent, (QTAtomContainer)myHandle);
00272         if (myErr != noErr) {
00273             BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Quicktime: SCSetSettingsFromAtomContainer failed\n"); 
00274             goto bail;
00275         }
00276 
00277         // update runtime codecsettings for use with the codec dialog
00278         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00279         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00280         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00281 
00282 
00283         //Fill the render QuicktimeCodecSettigns struct
00284         rd->qtcodecsettings.codecTemporalQuality = (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00285         //Do not override scene frame rate (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.framerate)
00286         rd->qtcodecsettings.keyFrameRate = qtdata->gTemporalSettings.keyFrameRate;
00287         
00288         rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType = qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType;
00289         rd->qtcodecsettings.codec = (int)qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codec;
00290         rd->qtcodecsettings.colorDepth = qtdata->gSpatialSettings.depth;
00291         rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality = (qtdata->gSpatialSettings.spatialQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00292         
00293         rd->qtcodecsettings.bitRate = qtdata->aDataRateSetting.dataRate;
00294         rd->qtcodecsettings.minSpatialQuality = (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minSpatialQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00295         rd->qtcodecsettings.minTemporalQuality = (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minTemporalQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00296         //Frame duration is already known (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.frameDuration)
00297         
00298     }
00299     else {
00300         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Quicktime: QT_GetCodecSettingsFromScene failed\n"); 
00301     }
00302 bail:
00303     if (myHandle != NULL)
00304         DisposeHandle(myHandle);
00305         
00306     return((OSErr)myErr);
00307 }

00309 
00310 static OSErr QT_AddUserDataTextToMovie (Movie theMovie, char *theText, OSType theType)
00311 {
00312     UserData                    myUserData = NULL;
00313     Handle                      myHandle = NULL;
00314     long                        myLength = strlen(theText);
00315     OSErr                       myErr = noErr;
00316 
00317     // get the movie's user data list
00318     myUserData = GetMovieUserData(theMovie);
00319     if (myUserData == NULL)
00320         return(paramErr);
00321     
00322     // copy the specified text into a new handle
00323     myHandle = NewHandleClear(myLength);
00324     if (myHandle == NULL)
00325         return(MemError());
00326 
00327     BlockMoveData(theText, *myHandle, myLength);
00328 
00329     // add the data to the movie's user data
00330     myErr = AddUserDataText(myUserData, myHandle, theType, 1, (short)GetScriptManagerVariable(smRegionCode));
00331 
00332     // clean up
00333     DisposeHandle(myHandle);
00334     return(myErr);
00335 }

00338 static void QT_CreateMyVideoTrack(int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00339 {
00340     OSErr err = noErr;
00341     Rect trackFrame;
00342 //  MatrixRecord myMatrix;
00343 
00344     trackFrame.top = 0;
00345     trackFrame.left = 0;
00346     trackFrame.bottom = recty;
00347     trackFrame.right = rectx;
00348     
00349     qtexport->theTrack = NewMovieTrack (qtexport->theMovie, 
00350                             FixRatio(trackFrame.right,1),
00351                             FixRatio(trackFrame.bottom,1), 
00352                             0);
00353     CheckError( GetMoviesError(), "NewMovieTrack error", reports );
00354 
00355 //  SetIdentityMatrix(&myMatrix);
00356 //  ScaleMatrix(&myMatrix, fixed1, Long2Fix(-1), 0, 0);
00357 //  TranslateMatrix(&myMatrix, 0, Long2Fix(trackFrame.bottom));
00358 //  SetMovieMatrix(qtexport->theMovie, &myMatrix);
00359 
00360     qtexport->theMedia = NewTrackMedia (qtexport->theTrack,
00361                             VideoMediaType,
00362                             qtdata->kVideoTimeScale,
00363                             nil,
00364                             0);
00365     CheckError( GetMoviesError(), "NewTrackMedia error", reports );
00366 
00367     err = BeginMediaEdits (qtexport->theMedia);
00368     CheckError( err, "BeginMediaEdits error", reports );
00369 
00370     QT_StartAddVideoSamplesToMedia (&trackFrame, rectx, recty, reports);
00371 } 
00372 
00373 
00374 static void QT_EndCreateMyVideoTrack(ReportList *reports)
00375 {
00376     OSErr err = noErr;
00377 
00378     QT_EndAddVideoSamplesToMedia ();
00379 
00380     err = EndMediaEdits (qtexport->theMedia);
00381     CheckError( err, "EndMediaEdits error", reports );
00382 
00383     err = InsertMediaIntoTrack (qtexport->theTrack,
00384                                 kTrackStart,/* track start time */
00385                                 kMediaStart,/* media start time */
00386                                 GetMediaDuration (qtexport->theMedia),
00387                                 fixed1);
00388     CheckError( err, "InsertMediaIntoTrack error", reports );
00389 }

00391 
00392 static void QT_StartAddVideoSamplesToMedia (const Rect *trackFrame, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00393 {
00394     SCTemporalSettings gTemporalSettings;
00395     OSErr err = noErr;
00396 
00397     qtexport->ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf (rectx, recty, 32, IB_rect);
00398     qtexport->ibuf2 = IMB_allocImBuf (rectx, recty, 32, IB_rect);
00399 
00400     err = NewGWorldFromPtr( &qtexport->theGWorld,
00401                             k32ARGBPixelFormat,
00402                             trackFrame,
00403                             NULL, NULL, 0,
00404                             (Ptr)qtexport->ibuf->rect,
00405                             rectx * 4 );
00406     CheckError (err, "NewGWorldFromPtr error", reports);
00407 
00408     qtexport->thePixMap = GetGWorldPixMap(qtexport->theGWorld);
00409     LockPixels(qtexport->thePixMap);
00410 
00411     SCDefaultPixMapSettings (qtdata->theComponent, qtexport->thePixMap, true);
00412 
00413     // workaround for crash with H.264, which requires an upgrade to
00414     // the new callback based api for proper encoding, but that's not
00415     // really compatible with rendering out frames sequentially
00416     gTemporalSettings = qtdata->gTemporalSettings;
00417     if (qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType == kH264CodecType) {
00418         if (gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality != codecMinQuality) {
00419             BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Only minimum quality compression supported for QuickTime H.264.\n");
00420             gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality = codecMinQuality;
00421         }
00422     }
00423 
00424     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &gTemporalSettings);
00425     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00426     SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00427 
00428     err = SCCompressSequenceBegin(qtdata->theComponent, qtexport->thePixMap, NULL, &qtexport->anImageDescription); 
00429     CheckError (err, "SCCompressSequenceBegin error", reports );
00430 }
00431 
00432 
00433 static void QT_DoAddVideoSamplesToMedia (int frame, int *pixels, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00434 {
00435     OSErr   err = noErr;
00436     Rect    imageRect;
00437 
00438     int     index;
00439     int     boxsize;
00440     unsigned char *from, *to;
00441 
00442     short   syncFlag;
00443     long    dataSize;
00444     Handle  compressedData;
00445     Ptr     myPtr;
00446 
00447 
00448     //copy and flip renderdata
00449     memcpy(qtexport->ibuf2->rect, pixels, 4*rectx*recty);
00450     IMB_flipy(qtexport->ibuf2);
00451 
00452     //get pointers to parse bitmapdata
00453     myPtr = GetPixBaseAddr(qtexport->thePixMap);
00454     imageRect = (**qtexport->thePixMap).bounds;
00455 
00456     from = (unsigned char *) qtexport->ibuf2->rect;
00457     to = (unsigned char *) myPtr;
00458 
00459     //parse RGBA bitmap into Quicktime's ARGB GWorld
00460     boxsize = rectx * recty;
00461     for ( index = 0; index < boxsize; index++) {
00462         to[0] = from[3];
00463         to[1] = from[0];
00464         to[2] = from[1];
00465         to[3] = from[2];
00466         to +=4, from += 4;
00467     }
00468 
00469     err = SCCompressSequenceFrame(qtdata->theComponent,
00470         qtexport->thePixMap,
00471         &imageRect,
00472         &compressedData,
00473         &dataSize,
00474         &syncFlag);
00475     CheckError(err, "SCCompressSequenceFrame error", reports);
00476 
00477     err = AddMediaSample(qtexport->theMedia,
00478         compressedData,
00479         0,
00480         dataSize,
00481         qtdata->duration,
00482         (SampleDescriptionHandle)qtexport->anImageDescription,
00483         1,
00484         syncFlag,
00485         NULL);
00486     CheckError(err, "AddMediaSample error", reports);
00487 }
00488 
00489 
00490 static void QT_EndAddVideoSamplesToMedia (void)
00491 {
00492     SCCompressSequenceEnd(qtdata->theComponent);
00493 
00494     UnlockPixels(qtexport->thePixMap);
00495     if (qtexport->theGWorld)
00496         DisposeGWorld (qtexport->theGWorld);
00497 
00498     if (qtexport->ibuf)
00499         IMB_freeImBuf(qtexport->ibuf);
00500 
00501     if (qtexport->ibuf2)
00502         IMB_freeImBuf(qtexport->ibuf2);
00503 } 
00504 
00505 
00506 void filepath_qt(char *string, RenderData *rd)
00507 {
00508     char txt[64];
00509 
00510     if (string==0) return;
00511 
00512     strcpy(string, rd->pic);
00513     BLI_path_abs(string, G.main->name);
00514 
00515     BLI_make_existing_file(string);
00516 
00517     if (BLI_strcasecmp(string + strlen(string) - 4, ".mov")) {
00518         sprintf(txt, "%04d-%04d.mov", (rd->sfra) , (rd->efra) );
00519         strcat(string, txt);
00520     }
00521 }
00522 
00523 
00524 int start_qt(struct Scene *scene, struct RenderData *rd, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00525 {
00526     OSErr err = noErr;
00527 
00528     char name[2048];
00529     char theFullPath[255];
00530 
00531 #ifdef __APPLE__
00532     int     myFile;
00533     FSRef   myRef;
00534 #else
00535     char    *qtname;
00536 #endif
00537     int success= 1;
00538 
00539     if (qtexport == NULL) qtexport = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeExport), "QuicktimeExport");
00540 
00541     if (qtdata) {
00542         if (qtdata->theComponent) CloseComponent(qtdata->theComponent);
00543         free_qtcomponentdata();
00544     }
00545 
00546     qtdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeComponentData), "QuicktimeCodecDataExt");
00547 
00548     if (rd->qtcodecdata == NULL || rd->qtcodecdata->cdParms == NULL) {
00549         get_qtcodec_settings(rd, reports);
00550     }
00551     else {
00552         qtdata->theComponent = OpenDefaultComponent(StandardCompressionType, StandardCompressionSubType);
00553 
00554         QT_GetCodecSettingsFromScene(rd, reports);
00555         check_renderbutton_framerate(rd, reports);
00556     }
00557     
00558     sframe = (rd->sfra);
00559 
00560     filepath_qt(name, rd);
00561 
00562 #ifdef __APPLE__
00563     EnterMoviesOnThread(0);
00564     sprintf(theFullPath, "%s", name);
00565 
00566     /* hack: create an empty file to make FSPathMakeRef() happy */
00567     myFile = open(theFullPath, O_CREAT|O_TRUNC, S_IRUSR|S_IWUSR|S_IRUSR|S_IWUSR);
00568     if (myFile < 0) {
00569         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "error while creating movie file!\n");
00570         /* do something? */
00571     }
00572     close(myFile);
00573     err = FSPathMakeRef((const UInt8 *)theFullPath, &myRef, 0);
00574     CheckError(err, "FsPathMakeRef error", reports);
00575     err = FSGetCatalogInfo(&myRef, kFSCatInfoNone, NULL, NULL, &qtexport->theSpec, NULL);
00576     CheckError(err, "FsGetCatalogInfoRef error", reports);
00577 #endif
00578 #ifdef _WIN32
00579     qtname = get_valid_qtname(name);
00580     sprintf(theFullPath, "%s", qtname);
00581     strcpy(name, qtname);
00582     MEM_freeN(qtname);
00583     
00584     CopyCStringToPascal(theFullPath, qtexport->qtfilename);
00585     err = FSMakeFSSpec(0, 0L, qtexport->qtfilename, &qtexport->theSpec);
00586 #endif
00587 
00588     err = CreateMovieFile (&qtexport->theSpec, 
00589                         kMyCreatorType,
00590                         smCurrentScript, 
00591                         createMovieFileDeleteCurFile | createMovieFileDontCreateResFile,
00592                         &qtexport->resRefNum, 
00593                         &qtexport->theMovie );
00594     CheckError(err, "CreateMovieFile error", reports);
00595 
00596     if (err != noErr) {
00597         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unable to create Quicktime movie: %s", name);
00598         success= 0;
00599 #ifdef __APPLE__
00600         ExitMoviesOnThread();
00601 #endif
00602     }
00603     else {
00604         //printf("Created QuickTime movie: %s\n", name);
00605 
00606         QT_CreateMyVideoTrack(rectx, recty, reports);
00607     }
00608 
00609     return success;
00610 }
00611 
00612 
00613 int append_qt(struct RenderData *rd, int start_frame, int frame, int *pixels, int rectx, int recty, ReportList *reports)
00614 {
00615     QT_DoAddVideoSamplesToMedia(frame, pixels, rectx, recty, reports);
00616     return 1;
00617 }
00618 
00619 
00620 void end_qt(void)
00621 {
00622     OSErr err = noErr;
00623     short resId = movieInDataForkResID;
00624 
00625     if (qtexport->theMovie) {
00626         QT_EndCreateMyVideoTrack(NULL);
00627 
00628         err = AddMovieResource (qtexport->theMovie, qtexport->resRefNum, &resId, qtexport->qtfilename);
00629         CheckError(err, "AddMovieResource error", NULL);
00630 
00631         err = QT_AddUserDataTextToMovie(qtexport->theMovie, "Made with Blender", kUserDataTextInformation);
00632         CheckError(err, "AddUserDataTextToMovie error", NULL);
00633 
00634         err = UpdateMovieResource(qtexport->theMovie, qtexport->resRefNum, resId, qtexport->qtfilename);
00635         CheckError(err, "UpdateMovieResource error", NULL);
00636 
00637         if (qtexport->resRefNum) CloseMovieFile(qtexport->resRefNum);
00638 
00639         DisposeMovie(qtexport->theMovie);
00640 
00641         //printf("Finished QuickTime movie.\n");
00642     }
00643 
00644 #ifdef __APPLE__
00645         ExitMoviesOnThread();
00646 #endif
00647     
00648     if (qtexport) {
00649         MEM_freeN(qtexport);
00650         qtexport = NULL;
00651     }
00652 }
00653 
00654 
00655 void free_qtcomponentdata(void)
00656 {
00657     if (qtdata) {
00658         if (qtdata->theComponent) CloseComponent(qtdata->theComponent);
00659         MEM_freeN(qtdata);
00660         qtdata = NULL;
00661     }
00662 }
00663 
00664 
00665 static void check_renderbutton_framerate(RenderData *rd, ReportList *reports) 
00666 {
00667     // to keep float framerates consistent between the codec dialog and frs/sec button.
00668     OSErr   err;    
00669 
00670     err = SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType,   &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00671     CheckError(err, "SCGetInfo fr error", reports);
00672 
00673     if ( (rd->frs_sec == 24 || rd->frs_sec == 30 || rd->frs_sec == 60) &&
00674         (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1571553 ||
00675          qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1964113 ||
00676          qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 3928227))
00677     {
00678         /* do nothing */
00679     }
00680     else {
00681         if (rd->frs_sec_base > 0)
00682             qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate = 
00683             ((float)(rd->frs_sec << 16) / rd->frs_sec_base);
00684     }
00685     
00686     err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType,   &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00687     CheckError( err, "SCSetInfo error", reports );
00688 
00689     if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1571553) {           // 23.98 fps
00690         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 24000;
00691         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00692     }
00693     else if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1964113) {  // 29.97 fps
00694         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 30000;
00695         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00696     }
00697     else if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 3928227) {  // 59.94 fps
00698         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 60000;
00699         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00700     }
00701     else {
00702         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate >> 16) * 100;
00703         qtdata->duration = 100;
00704     }
00705 }
00706 
00707 void quicktime_verify_image_type(RenderData *rd, ImageFormatData *imf)
00708 {
00709     if (imf->imtype == R_IMF_IMTYPE_QUICKTIME) {
00710         if ((rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType== 0) ||
00711             (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality <0) ||
00712             (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality > 100)) {
00713             
00714             rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType = kJPEGCodecType;
00715             rd->qtcodecsettings.codec = (int)anyCodec;
00716             rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality = (codecHighQuality*100)/codecLosslessQuality;
00717             rd->qtcodecsettings.codecTemporalQuality = (codecHighQuality*100)/codecLosslessQuality;
00718             rd->qtcodecsettings.keyFrameRate = 25;
00719             rd->qtcodecsettings.bitRate = 5000000; //5 Mbps
00720         }
00721     }
00722 }
00723 
00724 int get_qtcodec_settings(RenderData *rd, ReportList *reports) 
00725 {
00726     OSErr err = noErr;
00727         // erase any existing codecsetting
00728     if (qtdata) {
00729         if (qtdata->theComponent) CloseComponent(qtdata->theComponent);
00730         free_qtcomponentdata();
00731     }
00732 
00733     // allocate new
00734     qtdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeComponentData), "QuicktimeComponentData");
00735     qtdata->theComponent = OpenDefaultComponent(StandardCompressionType, StandardCompressionSubType);
00736 
00737     // get previous selected codecsetting, from qtatom or detailed settings
00738     if (rd->qtcodecdata && rd->qtcodecdata->cdParms) {
00739         QT_GetCodecSettingsFromScene(rd, reports);
00740     }
00741     else {
00742         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00743         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00744         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00745 
00746         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType = rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType;
00747         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codec = (CodecComponent)rd->qtcodecsettings.codec;      
00748         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.spatialQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality * codecLosslessQuality) /100;
00749         qtdata->gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecTemporalQuality * codecLosslessQuality) /100;
00750         qtdata->gTemporalSettings.keyFrameRate = rd->qtcodecsettings.keyFrameRate;   
00751         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.dataRate = rd->qtcodecsettings.bitRate;
00752         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.depth = rd->qtcodecsettings.colorDepth;
00753         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minSpatialQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.minSpatialQuality * codecLosslessQuality) / 100;
00754         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minTemporalQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.minTemporalQuality * codecLosslessQuality) / 100;
00755         
00756         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.frameDuration = rd->frs_sec;
00757         SetMovieTimeScale(qtexport->theMovie, rd->frs_sec_base*1000);
00758         
00759         
00760         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType,   &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00761         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo1 error", reports);
00762         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,    &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00763         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo2 error", reports);
00764         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType,   &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00765         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo3 error", reports);
00766     }
00767 
00768     check_renderbutton_framerate(rd, reports);
00769     
00770     return err;
00771 }
00772 
00773 static int request_qtcodec_settings(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00774 {
00775     OSErr   err = noErr;
00776     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00777     RenderData *rd = &scene->r;
00778 
00779     // erase any existing codecsetting
00780     if (qtdata) {
00781         if (qtdata->theComponent) CloseComponent(qtdata->theComponent);
00782         free_qtcomponentdata();
00783     }
00784     
00785     // allocate new
00786     qtdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(QuicktimeComponentData), "QuicktimeComponentData");
00787     qtdata->theComponent = OpenDefaultComponent(StandardCompressionType, StandardCompressionSubType);
00788     
00789     // get previous selected codecsetting, from qtatom or detailed settings
00790     if (rd->qtcodecdata && rd->qtcodecdata->cdParms) {
00791         QT_GetCodecSettingsFromScene(rd, op->reports);
00792     }
00793     else {
00794         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00795         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00796         SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00797         
00798         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType = rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType;
00799         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codec = (CodecComponent)rd->qtcodecsettings.codec;      
00800         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.spatialQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality * codecLosslessQuality) /100;
00801         qtdata->gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.codecTemporalQuality * codecLosslessQuality) /100;
00802         qtdata->gTemporalSettings.keyFrameRate = rd->qtcodecsettings.keyFrameRate;
00803         qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate = ((float)(rd->frs_sec << 16) / rd->frs_sec_base);
00804         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.dataRate = rd->qtcodecsettings.bitRate;
00805         qtdata->gSpatialSettings.depth = rd->qtcodecsettings.colorDepth;
00806         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minSpatialQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.minSpatialQuality * codecLosslessQuality) / 100;
00807         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minTemporalQuality = (rd->qtcodecsettings.minTemporalQuality * codecLosslessQuality) / 100;
00808         
00809         qtdata->aDataRateSetting.frameDuration = rd->frs_sec;       
00810         
00811         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType,   &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00812         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo1 error", op->reports);
00813         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,    &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00814         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo2 error", op->reports);
00815         err = SCSetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType,   &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00816         CheckError(err, "SCSetInfo3 error", op->reports);
00817     }
00818         // put up the dialog box - it needs to be called from the main thread
00819     err = SCRequestSequenceSettings(qtdata->theComponent);
00820  
00821     if (err == scUserCancelled) {
00822         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00823     }
00824 
00825         // update runtime codecsettings for use with the codec dialog
00826     SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scDataRateSettingsType, &qtdata->aDataRateSetting);
00827     SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scSpatialSettingsType,  &qtdata->gSpatialSettings);
00828     SCGetInfo(qtdata->theComponent, scTemporalSettingsType, &qtdata->gTemporalSettings);
00829     
00830     
00831         //Fill the render QuicktimeCodecSettings struct
00832     rd->qtcodecsettings.codecTemporalQuality = (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.temporalQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00833         //Do not override scene frame rate (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.framerate)
00834     rd->qtcodecsettings.keyFrameRate = qtdata->gTemporalSettings.keyFrameRate;
00835     
00836     rd->qtcodecsettings.codecType = qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codecType;
00837     rd->qtcodecsettings.codec = (int)qtdata->gSpatialSettings.codec;
00838     rd->qtcodecsettings.colorDepth = qtdata->gSpatialSettings.depth;
00839     rd->qtcodecsettings.codecSpatialQuality = (qtdata->gSpatialSettings.spatialQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00840     
00841     rd->qtcodecsettings.bitRate = qtdata->aDataRateSetting.dataRate;
00842     rd->qtcodecsettings.minSpatialQuality = (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minSpatialQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00843     rd->qtcodecsettings.minTemporalQuality = (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.minTemporalQuality * 100) / codecLosslessQuality;
00844         //Frame duration is already known (qtdata->aDataRateSetting.frameDuration)
00845     
00846     QT_SaveCodecSettingsToScene(rd, op->reports);
00847 
00848     // framerate jugglin'
00849     if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1571553) {           // 23.98 fps
00850         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 24000;
00851         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00852 
00853         rd->frs_sec = 24;
00854         rd->frs_sec_base = 1.001;
00855     }
00856     else if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 1964113) {  // 29.97 fps
00857         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 30000;
00858         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00859 
00860         rd->frs_sec = 30;
00861         rd->frs_sec_base = 1.001;
00862     }
00863     else if (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate == 3928227) {  // 59.94 fps
00864         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 60000;
00865         qtdata->duration = 1001;
00866 
00867         rd->frs_sec = 60;
00868         rd->frs_sec_base = 1.001;
00869     }
00870     else {
00871         double fps = qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate;
00872 
00873         qtdata->kVideoTimeScale = 60000;
00874         qtdata->duration = qtdata->kVideoTimeScale / (qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate / 65536);
00875 
00876         if ((qtdata->gTemporalSettings.frameRate & 0xffff) == 0) {
00877             rd->frs_sec = fps / 65536;
00878             rd->frs_sec_base = 1.0;
00879         }
00880         else {
00881             /* we do our very best... */
00882             rd->frs_sec = fps  / 65536;
00883             rd->frs_sec_base = 1.0;
00884         }
00885     }
00886 
00887     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00888 }
00889 
00890 static int ED_operator_setqtcodec(bContext *C)
00891 {
00892     return G.have_quicktime != FALSE;
00893 }
00894 
00895 #if defined(__APPLE__) && defined(GHOST_COCOA)
00896 //Need to set up a Cocoa NSAutoReleasePool to avoid memory leak
00897 //And it must be done in an objC file, so use a GHOST_SystemCocoa.mm function for that
00898 extern int cocoa_request_qtcodec_settings(bContext *C, wmOperator *op);
00899 
00900 int fromcocoa_request_qtcodec_settings(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00901 {
00902     return request_qtcodec_settings(C, op);
00903 }
00904 #endif

00906 
00907 void SCENE_OT_render_data_set_quicktime_codec(wmOperatorType *ot)
00908 {
00909     /* identifiers */
00910     ot->name = "Change codec";
00911     ot->description = "Change Quicktime codec Settings";
00912     ot->idname = "SCENE_OT_render_data_set_quicktime_codec";
00913     
00914     /* api callbacks */
00915 #if defined(__APPLE__) && defined(GHOST_COCOA)
00916     ot->exec = cocoa_request_qtcodec_settings;
00917 #else
00918     ot->exec = request_qtcodec_settings;
00919 #endif
00920     ot->poll = ED_operator_setqtcodec;
00921     
00922     /* flags */
00923     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00924 }
00925 
00926 #endif /* USE_QTKIT */
00927 #endif /* _WIN32 || __APPLE__ */
00928 #endif /* WITH_QUICKTIME */
